title: Psychological support
subtitle: We understand. We feel reciprocated. We do care.

paragraphs.normal1: We want to ensure that the displaced persons from Ukraine, despite being faced with devastating circumstances, have enough personal resources and necessary psychosocial support to maintain their mental well-being and have more control over their lives to make informed and positive outcome-oriented choices.
paragraphs.normal2: With this goal in mind, we involve competent and professional clinical psychologists and psychotherapists to help traumatized individuals work through their lived experiences, and strengthen their moral condition for the sake of improving their quality of life.
